title: Successful response with details about a push credential

id.description: Unique identifier of a push credential

certificate.description: Apple certificate for sending push notifications. For iOS only

private_key.description: Apple private key for a given certificate for sending push notifications. For iOS only
private_key.example: -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- MIIEpQIBAAKCAQEAsNlRJVZn9ZvXcECQm65czs... -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

project_account_json_file.description: Google server key for sending push notifications. For Android only

alias.description: Alias to uniquely identify a credential

type.description: Type of mobile push credential. Either ios or android

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room was updated.
